get.summary: Returns all executed and successful requests charged by Schwacke. A date interval is required to perform a search within this period.

parameters.name: beginDateRange
parameters.description: The date that describes the beginning of the time interval

parameters.name: endDateRange
parameters.description: The date that describes the end of the time interval

id.description: Additional ID of the basic equipment according to Schwacke

code.description: SOA code according to Schwacke of the basic equipment

description.description: Long text / description of the basic equipment

manufacturerCode.description: Manufacturer order code of the basic equipment

flagPack.description: Flag that describes whether the equipment belongs to a package, is individual, or both. 0 - Individual item, 1 - Equipment package, 2 - Individual item but also included in an equipment package

targetGroup.description: Flag that describes whether the equipment belongs to a fleet package (0 = Customer (Standard), 1 = Fleet only)

esacoList.description: List of Schwacke Esacos applicable to the basic equipment

colorDataList.description: List of available colors for this basic equipment

id.description: Schwacke additional ID of the optional equipment

code.description: Schwacke SOA code of the optional equipment

description.description: Long text / description of the optional equipment

manufacturerCode.description: Manufacturer order code of the optional equipment

flagPack.description: Flag that describes if the equipment belongs to a package, is individual, or both. 0 - Individual item 1 - Equipment package 2 - Individual item but also included in an equipment package

targetGroup.description: Flag that describes if the equipment belongs to a fleet package: 0 = Customer (Standard) 1 = Fleet only

priceNet.description: Net price of the optional equipment

priceGross.description: Gross price of the optional equipment

colorDataList.description: List of available colors for this optional equipment

esacoList.description: List of Schwacke Esacos applicable to the optional equipment

manufacturerColorName.description: Name of the color by the manufacturer

manufacturerColorType.description: The type of a manufacturer color: exterior color or interior upholstery color. 0 = Exterior color, 1 = Interior upholstery color

mainGroupName.description: The name of the main group

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the error occurred

path.description: The path that triggered the error

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the request associated with the error

ambiguous_vin.description: ambiguous_vin of the from vin request of GetVehicleByVin_Response

nationalTypeCode.description: Schwacke NAT Code of the type, also known as Schwacke-Code"

globalTypeId.description: global id of the car across all data sources

typeNameExtension.description: Type description/name extension of the car

productionBegin.description: Start date of production of the model

productionEnd.description: End date of production of the model

vehicleClassCode.description: Vehicle class code of the model

nationalVehicleType.description: Schwacke vehicle type of the model

bodyTypeCode.description: Body type code of the car

driveTypeCode.description: Drive type code of the car

transmissionTypeCode.description: Transmission type code of the car

electricContinuousPowerKW30.description: Electric continuous power in kilowatts (30 minutes)

electricContinuousPowerHP30.description: Electric continuous power in horsepower (30 minutes)

electricContinuousPowerKW60.description: Electric continuous power in kilowatts (60 minutes)

electricContinuousPowerHP60.description: Electric continuous power in horsepower (60 minutes)

powerInNationalHomologationPapersKW.description: Power in national homologation papers in kilowatts

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the vehicle.

net.description: Vehicle price base model net (without equipment)

gross.description: Vehicle price base model gross (without equipment)

production.description: The production date of the vehicle.

delivery.description: The delivery date of the vehicle.

registration.description: The registration date of the vehicle.

dates.description: Dates related to the vehicle including production, delivery, and registration dates.

description.description: The description of the vehicle's color.

code.description: The color code associated with the vehicle's color.

description.description: The description of the vehicle's upholstery.

code.description: The upholstery code associated with the vehicle's upholstery.

manufacturerCode.description: The manufacturer code of the equipment.

priceListBeginDate.description: The start date of the price list for the equipment.

priceListEndDate.description: The end date of the price list for the equipment.

code.description: The ESACO code associated with the equipment.

manufacturerCode.description: The manufacturer code of the equipment.

net.description: The net price of the equipment.

gross.description: The gross price of the equipment.

equipment.description: Equipment data including basic and selected equipment items.

vin.description: <!--GetVehicleByVin_Request-->VIN / Vehicle Identification Number of the vehicle

nationalTypeCode.description: <!--GetVehicleByVin_Request-->Schwacke-NAT code of the type (optional, especially for multiple responses from the service)

vinSwitch.description:
<!--GetVehicleByVin_Request-->Switch for invoking the Schwacke VIN service:
#### 1 = VIN query allowed:
VIN query is allowed. However, the VIN query will only be performed if the vehicle is not already known in the Vehicle System (VS). If the vehicle is already known in the VS, the vehicle stored in the VS will be returned without a VIN query.
#### 2 = VIN query not allowed:
VIN query is not allowed. It only returns a vehicle if it is known in the VS; otherwise, an error message is returned.
#### 3 = Force VIN query:
VIN query is forced. In this case, if a vehicle is already known in the VS, it will be updated with the result from the VIN query. If the vehicle is not known, it will be newly created.

GetVehicleByVin_Request.description: Wholesales: Fetches the Vehicle of the VIN request (Schwacke VinService) Request's Format

GetVehicleValuation_Response.description: Determines the current market value of an existing vehicle based on the transferred Schwacke-TypId, the date of the first registration, the mileage and the transferred special equipment.

ambiguous_vin.description: ambiguous_vin of the from vin request of GetVehicleByVin_Response

nationalTypeCode.description: Schwacke NAT Code of the type, also known as Schwacke-Code"

GetVehicleValuationByVin_Response.description: Determines the current market value of an existing vehicle based on the transferred Schwacke-TypId, the date of the first registration, the mileage and the transferred special equipment.

service.description: Service being called (here: VIN or VALUATION)

numberOfRequests.description: Number of service calls for the combination within the array

auditLogData.description: Contains the list of AuditLog summaries
